title: White
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:White

White may refer to:

  • Armadyl, a god associated with the colour white.
  • White Knights, knights clad in the colour white.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • White golem
  • White Knight
  • White wolf

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Castle Wars rewards:
    • White decorative helm
    • White decorative body
    • White decorative legs
    • White decorative skirt
    • White decorative sword
    • White decorative shield
  • Garden of Tranquillity items:
    • White tree fruit
    • White tree sapling
    • White tree shoot
  • Holiday items:
    • White destabiliser
    • White partyhat
  • White and gold mystic robes:
    • Mystic hat (light)
    • Mystic robe top (light)
    • Mystic robe bottom (light)
    • Mystic boots (light)
    • Mystic gloves (light)
  • Temple Knight Armour, part of the White Knights:
    • Initiate armour
    • Proselyte armour
  • Treasure Trail items:
    • White beret
    • White boater
    • White cavalier
    • White elegant blouse
    • White elegant skirt
    • White firelighter
    • White headband
    • White unicorn mask
  • White equipment:
    • Armour:
      • White med helm
      • White full helm
      • White chainbody
      • White platebody
      • White platelegs
      • White plateskirt
      • White sq shield
      • White kiteshield
      • White boots
      • White gloves
    • Weapons:
      • Melee:
        • White 2h sword
        • White battleaxe
        • White claws
        • White dagger
        • White halberd
        • White longsword
        • White mace
        • White scimitar
        • White sword
        • White warhammer
      • Magic:
        • White magic staff
  • Desert clothing, white-coloured robes.
  • Whiteberry seed
  • White apron
  • White bead, an item used in the Imp Catcher quest.
  • White berries
  • White cog, an item used in the Clock Tower quest.
  • White dark bow paint
  • White flowers
  • White logs
  • White pearl, an item used in the Mountain Daughter quest.
  • White pearl seed, an item used in the Mountain Daughter quest.
  • White rose seed, an item used in the Garden of Tranquillity quest.
  • White toy horsey

Other[edit | edit source]

  • White Chisel a dwarven mining company in Keldagrim and its associates:
    • White Chisel Director
    • White Chisel Secretary
  • White tree
  • White Knights' Castle, a location.
  • White Wolf Mountain, a location.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
